properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NM_TITLE , NM_POSTER , NM_ENROLL_DATE , NM_APPROVAL , NM_STORY , NM.MEM_NO AS MEM_NO , M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME , NM_ENROLL_NO FROM NO_MOVIE_ENROLL NM JOIN MEMBER M ON (NM.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) ORDER BY DECODE(NM.NM_APPROVAL, 'D', 1) DESC, NM.NM_ENROLL_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT NM_TITLE , NM_POSTER , NM_ENROLL_DATE , NM_APPROVAL , NM_STORY , NM.MEM_NO AS MEM_NO , M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME , NM_ENROLL_NO FROM NO_MOVIE_ENROLL NM JOIN MEMBER M ON (NM.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE NM_APPROVAL = ? ORDER BY NM.NM_ENROLL_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT INQRY_NO , INQRY_TITLE , INQRY_CONTENT , CASE WHEN INQRY_STATUS = 'Y' THEN '답변완료' WHEN INQRY_STATUS = 'N' THEN '답변대기' END AS INQRY_STATUS , INQRY_DATE , NVL(INQRY_A_CONTENT, '없음') INQRY_A_CONTENT , ATT.ORIGIN_NAME , ATT.AT_URL FROM INQUIRY LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_NO, MAX(ORIGIN_NAME) AS ORIGIN_NAME, MAX(FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME) AS AT_URL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_TYPE = '7' GROUP BY REF_NO ) ATT ON INQRY_NO = ATT.REF_NO ORDER BY INQRY_STATUS, INQRY_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO NO_MOVIE_GENRE ( NM_GENRE_NO , CATEGORY_NO , NM_ENROLL_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NO_MOVIE_GENRE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , SEQ_NO_MOVIE_ENROLL_NO.CURRVAL )
